thread.section_title: Citadines Bastille Marais Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Stay at Best
thread.title_full: Good Stay at Best - Review of Citadines Bastille Marais Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rajesh_sml
title: Good Stay at Best
text:
Stayed at this place for one week while on a Business Travel.
Pros:
The Place is quite approachable, by Metro and is at a very good place
The Staff is excellent, always ready to help and smiling; They help you with bookings of Taxi and will help you in understanding of this area.
Good spacious room, generally we do not find big rooms in Paris
Kitchen and ample utensils - Really beneficial for a vegetarian person as choice of vegetarian food is limited in Paris
Coffee available at reception till midnight
Things that can be better::
Wifi - Not very good. certainly should be looked at
Rooms facing the street have traffic noise, the rooms are not soundproof, difficult to sleep sometimes.
Cleaning once a week only was a surprise. certainly not a roadblock though
Overall a good stay...
